page.title: 11Changes over 20 years
page.content: Many small farms have been bought out by big farms.In Presteigne when you walked down the street you would have known everyone-there are lots of strangers now.Farming is more mechanized and there is more stock per acre.The roads have been improved and there is much more traffic.The farms have more tractors and machinery and less people work on the land. The schools have become comprehensive and much bigger.Mains water has come to many houses.More stock is wintered indoors -stock is not so hardy.Very few people at the churches,village schools have closed round here.Public transport has almost ceased.Deliveries of bread and grocery in these parts has stopped almost completely.In l962 we had electricity for the first time and then the phone in l980 (-several examples of this last sentence)
